data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Nagappattinam to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nagappattinam, Tamil Nadu, India

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 17,782 believers in Nagappattinam to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary: On average, 131 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Nagappattinam, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Nagappattinam, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Nagappattinam to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Vallon people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,616,500 people living in Nagappattinam.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Nagappattinam. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the county of Nagappattinam, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 1,616,500.

We estimate Nagappattinam has 17,782 people who might know Jesus, 19,613 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,579,105 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Nagappattinam, Tamil Nadu, India will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
